subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: St. John’s dropped to a 10-10 record after its loss to No. 3 UConn. The Red Storm are trying to make the N.C.A.A. tournament, which they will host the first two rounds.
snippet: St. John’s dropped to a 10-10 record after its loss to No. 3 UConn. The Red Storm are trying to make the N.C.A.A. tournament, which they will host the first two rounds.
